bug.author: THEDFG
bug.summary: Linux (Ubuntu) Error: Bus error at line: "import turicreate as tc"
bug.description: <denchmark-code>(venv) user@linux:~/stml$ python styleTransfer.py #import turicreate as tc Bus error </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/THEDFG>@THEDFG</denchmark-link> , could you please provide steps to reproduce this issue? As it is, most Linux users are able to successfully - and I haven't seen this before.

Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/znation>@znation</denchmark-link> , DISTRIB_DESCRIPTION="Ubuntu 16.04.3 LTS" NAME="Ubuntu" VERSION="16.04.3 LTS (Xenial Xerus)" ID=ubuntu ID_LIKE=debian PRETTY_NAME="Ubuntu 16.04.3 LTS" VERSION_ID="16.04" HOME_URL="<denchmark-link:http://www.ubuntu.com/>http://www.ubuntu.com/</denchmark-link> " SUPPORT_URL="<denchmark-link:http://help.ubuntu.com/>http://help.ubuntu.com/</denchmark-link> " BUG_REPORT_URL="<denchmark-link:http://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/>http://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/</denchmark-link> " VERSION_CODENAME=xenial UBUNTU_CODENAME=xenial <denchmark-link:https://mega.nz/#!3MUGTAxL!FOHeBfSe7CmhnTl7CXM_uMmYemqruWJ6nE5Q70nsick>https://mega.nz/#!3MUGTAxL!FOHeBfSe7CmhnTl7CXM_uMmYemqruWJ6nE5Q70nsick</denchmark-link>

Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/THEDFG>@THEDFG</denchmark-link> , I've been generally able to run turicreate successfully on Ubuntu 16.04.3 LTS. I can't tell what the contents of that link are that you provided; I see a disk image, but it doesn't appear to be something usable on my machine. Please provide specific repro steps that I can perform to reproduce the issue locally, including installation (if necessary) of common off-the-shelf operating systems as needed. Again, in general though, I am not able to reproduce this issue in Ubuntu 16.04 LTS.
This may apparently repro on the Ubuntu-derived SimpleMiningOS, but not stock Ubuntu. Need to investigate.

Thank you very much Zack. Meanwhile I will try to install an official Ubuntu version.
Best regards <denchmark-link:#>…</denchmark-link>
On 18 Jul 2018, at 21:29, Zach Nation ***@***.***> wrote:
This may apparently repro on the Ubuntu-derived SimpleMiningOS, but not stock Ubuntu. Need to investigate.
— You are receiving this because you were mentioned. Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub, or mute the thread.
Closing this issue. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/THEDFG>@THEDFG</denchmark-link> - please reopen if this is still an issue.
